# autoglue_cluster (Resource)

Manages an Autoglue cluster (name, provider, region). Attachments such as domains, record sets, load balancers, bastion and node pools are managed via separate resources.



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `cluster_provider` (String) Cluster provider identifier (e.g. aws, azure, gcp).
- `name` (String) Cluster name.
- `region` (String) Cluster region identifier.

### Read-Only

- `apps_load_balancer_id` (String) ID of the apps load balancer attached to this cluster, if any.
- `bastion_server_id` (String) ID of the bastion server attached to this cluster, if any.
- `captain_domain_id` (String) ID of the captain domain attached to this cluster, if any.
- `certificate_key` (String, Sensitive) Cluster certificate key generated by the control plane.
- `control_plane_fqdn` (String) Effective control-plane FQDN if both domain and record set are attached.
- `control_plane_record_set_id` (String) ID of the control plane record set attached to this cluster, if any.
- `created_at` (String) Creation timestamp (RFC3339).
- `glueops_load_balancer_id` (String) ID of the GlueOps/control-plane load balancer attached to this cluster, if any.
- `id` (String) Cluster ID.
- `last_error` (String) Last validation/provisioning error, if any.
- `random_token` (String, Sensitive) Random token generated by the control plane for this cluster.
- `status` (String) Cluster status (e.g. pre_pending, ready, failed).
- `updated_at` (String) Last update timestamp (RFC3339).
